content: fun and easy crochet lantern the pattern can be customized to your own liking beginner-friendly *supplies* scheepjes catona fingering weight or similar in one or multiple colors 1 metal hoop 15 cm/6 in diameter 15 small beads optional darning needle scissors *stitches used* slip_stitch chain single_crochet double_crochet dc3tog written pattern with explanatory photos
